title: Exogenesis: Symphony, Pt. 1 (Overture)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Aping my soul
You stole my overture
Trapped in God's program
Oh, I can't escape
[Chorus]
Who are we?
Where are we?
When are we?
Why are we?
Who are we?
Where are we?
Why, why, why?
[Verse 2]
I can't forgive you
And I can't forget
[Chorus]
Who are we?
Where are we?
When are we?
Why are we in here?
Who are we?
Where are we?
When are we?
Why are we in here?
